full_summary:
**Green Immersion Suits Mustang**
**Advanced Contract Award Notice**
**Contract Reference Number**: cb-528-77709241
**Solicitation Number**: W8485-247670/A
**Publication Date**: 2023-11-21
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-06, 2:00 PM EST

The Department of National Defence (DND) has issued an advanced contract award notice (ACAN) for the procurement of Green Immersion Suits Mustang. 

**Supply Description**

This procurement requires the delivery of anti-exposure coveralls, specifically: 
1. *8475-20-002-2709*: Coveralls, Flyers' Antiexposure (30 off) 
    - Multiyear delivery periods: FY23/24 - 5; FY24/25 - 0, FY25/26 - 0, FY26/27 - 5, FY27/28 - 5 
    - Destination address: 7 CF Supply Depot Lancaster Park, 195 Ave & 82nd St., Bldg 236, Edmonton, Alberta T5J 4J5 
2. *8475-20-002-2710*: Coveralls, Flyers' Antiexposure (80 off) 
    - Multiyear delivery periods: FY23/24 - 10; FY24/25 - 10; FY25/26 - 5; FY26/27 - 5; FY27/28 - 5 
    - Destination address: 7 CF Supply Depot Lancaster Park, 195 Ave & 82nd St., Bldg 236, Edmonton, Alberta T5J 4J5

Bidders are required to submit offers for the specified items/delivery periods mentioned above.

**Notice**

Notice is hereby given that the Crown intends to enter into a contract for the procurement described above. 

A copy of the solicitation document and subsequent amendments, if any, are available on the Canada Bids website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25448/w8485-247670-acan-en.pdf (English) and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25448/w8485-247670-acan-fr.pdf (French).

**Contact Information**

Dany Lebel
Tel.: (000) 000-0000
Email: [dany.lebel2](mailto:d
